tasks.label: Start OpenCRVS services
tasks.command: cd opencrvs-core && npx lerna run build --scope @opencrvs/commons && MINIO_URL="https://$CODESPACE_NAME-3535.app.github.dev" npx lerna run build --scope @opencrvs/components && OTHER_LERNA_FLAGS="--ignore @opencrvs/components --ignore @opencrvs/client --ignore @opencrvs/login" yarn start

tasks.label: Start OpenCRVS clients
tasks.command: cd opencrvs-core && COUNTRY_CONFIG_URL="https://$CODESPACE_NAME-3040.app.github.dev" npx lerna exec --scope @opencrvs/client --scope @opencrvs/login -- yarn start --host
